In addition to the standard cognitive tests supported by the BDM data structure, custom tasks can store additional data in the BDM database.

- [ ] events: add custom schemas for the new events
- [ ] trials: mark additional columns in the trials table with a special `_` prefix
- [ ] data types or tables: add to codebook and partition data by agent/session/activity
